configd:help.text: Open Shortest Path First protocol (OSPF) parameters
Enable rfc1583 criteria for handling AS external routes
Access list to filter networks in routing updates
Access list to filter networks in routing updates
Suppress routing updates on an interface
Redistribute information from another routing protocol
OSPF tag identifier for summary address.
Summary address which shouldn't be advertised.
OSPF metric type for default routes
Interval after which a neighbor is declared dead
Interval between retransmitting lost link state advertisements
Do not inject inter-area routes into stub
Distribute a default route into an NSSA area
OSPF metric type for default routes
Do not inject inter-area routes into stub
Summarize routes matching prefix (border routers only)
Summarize routes matching prefix (border routers only)
Calculate OSPF interface cost according to bandwidth
Reference bandwidth method to assign OSPF cost
configure type of ospf overflow protection
Hard limit on number of LSAs, instance will shut down if limit exceeded
Time to recover (0 implies no recovery)
Soft limit on number of LSAs in database, will warn if exceeded

error-message.value: Password must be 8 characters or less
MD5 key must be 16 characters or less
